text:
My experience has mainly been hard surface but I've always liked to do some organic as well.
Anyway, thank you for sharing your experience with me. I am wishing you all the best in your career and I am hoping you are staying safe and healthy during these difficult times. Here is my email address in case you wish to stay in touch: <mailto:michael@neymarcvisuals.com|michael@neymarcvisuals.com>. Here is my company's website where I am main VFX artist: <https://www.neymarcvisuals.com/nvfx>. Disregard the bugs, it's currently under construction.
